17#include "lib.h"
18#include "metadata.h"
19#include "xlate.h"
20#include "filter.h"
21
22#ifdef linux
23
24#define MAX_PAGESIZE (64 * 1024)
25#define SIGNATURE_SIZE 10
26
27static int
28_swap_detect_signature(const char *buf)
29{
30 if (memcmp(buf, "SWAP-SPACE", 10) == 0 ||
31 memcmp(buf, "SWAPSPACE2", 10) == 0)
32 return 1;
33
34 if (memcmp(buf, "S1SUSPEND", 9) == 0 ||
35 memcmp(buf, "S2SUSPEND", 9) == 0 ||
36 memcmp(buf, "ULSUSPEND", 9) == 0 ||
37 memcmp(buf, "\xed\xc3\x02\xe9\x98\x56\xe5\x0c", 8) == 0)
38 return 1;
39
40 return 0;
41}
42
43int dev_is_swap(struct device *dev, uint64_t *signature)
44{
45 char buf[10];
46 uint64_t size;
47 int page;
48
49 if (!dev_get_size(dev, &size)) {
50 stack;
51 return -1;
52 }
53
54 if (!dev_open(dev)) {
55 stack;
56 return -1;
57 }
58
59 *signature = 0;
60
61 for (page = 0x1000; page <= MAX_PAGESIZE; page <<= 1) {
62 /*
63 * skip 32k pagesize since this does not seem to be supported
64 */
65 if (page == 0x8000)
66 continue;
67 if (size < page)
68 break;
69 if (!dev_read(dev, page - SIGNATURE_SIZE,
70 SIGNATURE_SIZE, buf)) {
71 stack;
72 return -1;
73 }
74 if (_swap_detect_signature(buf)) {
75 *signature = page - SIGNATURE_SIZE;
76 break;
77 }
78 }
79
80 if (!dev_close(dev))
81 stack;
82
83 if (*signature)
84 return 1;
85
86 return 0;
87}
88
89#else
90
91#ifdef __NetBSD__
92int dev_is_swap(struct device *dev, uint64_t *signature)
93{
94 return 0;
95}
96#endif
97
98#endif
99
